Properties.Name: Send Final Baptism Class Email if "Not Ready"
Properties.Description: An email will get triggered and sent to the requestor whenever the Future Follow-Up date of the baptism class connection is reached.

Properties.Name: Set the Connection Request from Guid
Active
Properties.Description: Should Service be used?

Properties.Name: Order
Properties.Description: The order that this service should be used (priority)

Properties.Name: Attribute
Properties.Description: The attribute to set the value of.

Properties.Name: Entity Is Required
Properties.Description: Should an error be returned if the entity is missing or not a valid entity type?

Properties.Name: Use Id instead of Guid
Properties.Description: Most entity attribute field types expect the Guid of the entity (which is used by default). Select this option if the entity's Id should be used instead (should be rare).

Properties.Name: Lava Template
Properties.Description: By default this action will set the attribute value equal to the guid (or id) of the entity that was passed in for processing. If you include a lava template here, the action will instead set the attribute value to the output of this template. The mergefield to use for the entity is 'Entity.' For example, use {{ Entity.Name }} if the entity has a Name property.
